summary.para: The namespace is the.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server.

remarks.para: The.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server describes a collection of classes used to access a SQL Server database in the managed space. Using the , you can fill a memory-resident that you can use to query and update the database.

block.para: For conceptual information about using this namespace when programming with the .NET Framework, see Using the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server.
